I'm looking for my MP3 player.
Did you look in the drawer?
No, I didn't put it in the drawer.
Did you look under the sofa?
No, it is not under the sofa.
Did you look in your bag?
I didn't look in my bag.
What, what, what, what do you look for?
Shoe, shoe, shoe, I look for my shoe.
Bed, bed, bed, did you look under the bed?
No, no, no, my shoe is not there.
Box, box, box, did you look in the box?
No, no, no, my shoe is not there.
Closet, closet, closet, did you look in the closet?
My shoe is right in the closet!
